sections.content: Promptotyping provides a structured framework for LLM-assisted development. The methodology addresses key challenges: hallucinations through multi-model verification, sycophancy through CEIL, context rot through phase separation, and understanding gaps through continuous documentation.

sections.content: The future of software development lies not in replacing human developers but in augmenting their capabilities. Promptotyping provides a framework for this augmentation while maintaining critical thinking and domain expertise at its core.

sections.title: Key Takeaway
sections.content: LLMs are powerful tools, but they require structured methodologies to be effective. Promptotyping provides this structure while acknowledging both the capabilities and limitations of current AI technology.
